hero.subtitle: A collection of my VR development and GameJam adventures. Each project is a small journey.

about.title: About Me
about.description: Hi! I'm a developer passionate about creating immersive experiences. Whether it's the boundless possibilities of VR or the creative constraints of GameJams, I love turning ideas into playable reality.

projects.title: Xuanji Shulu
projects.description: Xuanji Shulu is a VR interactive experience built around ancient Chinese astronomy. You step into four scenes inspired by the Taichu calendar, solar terms, and star maps, operating ancient instruments and watching the sky change. With a virtual young assistant guiding you, abstract calendar knowledge becomes easier to see and understand, and you quietly feel the patience and curiosity behind traditional science.
award: National 3D Digital Design Competition · Provincial Special Prize
China Computer Design Competition · Provincial First Prize

projects.title: Reverse Scripture
projects.description: Reverse Scripture is a VR action-adventure about a society ruled for centuries by a holy book that controls all magic. You play as an awakened mage exploring ancient ruins, uncovering sealed arcane powers and freely combining sword techniques with spells in combat. As the truth behind the scripture surfaces and the world tilts into crisis, you must decide whether to destroy the book or leave behind a new version of the truth for those who come after.
projects.award: CMIT National Digital Media Competition · Provincial First Prize

projects.title: Fake Office Worker
projects.description: You play as a small panda who infiltrates a human company to earn money. Wearing an oversized suit and standing on the shoulders of two other small animals, you disguise yourself as an ordinary office worker. Within a workday, you need to control the character by clicking or using the keyboard to maintain "physical balance" while working. The longer you work, the greater the challenge—the boss's suspicion will gradually accumulate. Pay attention to the shaking warning icon; it indicates when the boss will appear. Respond to randomly appearing pop-up events and boss questions; your choices will affect the suspicion value. The character's expressions will also reflect their status in real-time, making each response more vivid. Balance operations, seize opportunities, respond cleverly—let's see how long you can last!
projects.award: Global GameJam Chengdu Station · Excellent Work

projects.title: Undefined Behavior
projects.description:
A chaotic, random multiplayer platform fighter.
Enter a digital colosseum where reality collapses and rules keep rewriting.
Survival isn’t just about execution — it’s about adapting to sudden "glitches".
In crumbling stages, use limited weapons and outplay your opponents.
"Be the last one standing."

projects.title: Eat is Rule
projects.description:
The Creator once defined everything with golden ink — and then left.
The ink dried, rules fractured, and the world collapsed into scattered word-shards.
You are Xiao Bai, a blank born at a break in logic: no name, no form, no attributes — a loophole.
Because you are nothing, you can devour the fallen attribute words and gain their powers.
Push and recombine the world's logic. Rewrite reality's source code.
When you gather enough truths and reach the Creator's desk, you pick up the pen — now you will write the new rules.

projects.title: Glitch
projects.description:
In a digital world dominated by code and logic, you are a tiny bug—an existence forgotten by the system.
This world was meant to run perfectly, but every corner hides vulnerabilities.
Those flaws ignored by programmers, those cracks that shouldn't exist, become your only way to survive.

projects.title: Synesthesia
projects.description:
When the boundaries between hearing and vision are broken, when darkness and silence become each other's guides...
How will the hearing-impaired and the visually-impaired use the magic of Synesthesia to complete this impossible collaboration?
Synesthesia, a wondrous psychological phenomenon where one sensory stimulus spontaneously triggers another—like seeing colors when hearing sounds. In 'Synesthesia', the two protagonists will use their missing senses to pave a wide path for each other.
